# Farallon AI Project
# Content for LLMs and AI Agents

# Site Description
title: Farallon - AI Music Artist
description: An immersive, cyber-noir experience for the generative AI music artist Farallon.

# Primary Content Routes
/ - Homepage
/bio - Artist Biography and Origin Story (Key context about the AI persona)
/discography - Full discography, track lists, and streaming links
/videos - Visual transmissions and music videos

# Machine Readable Data
/discography.json - JSON feed of all albums and tracks
/sitemap.xml - Standard sitemap

# Contact
email: Farallon@farallonai.com
